Text: WrapcoI will need a slate of officers and directors to form Wrapco I was thinking SOG Corp unless you object Inspiration from sitting across the table from Stuart for the last days and he is the one who has incorporated all the others Also will be changing the name of ERMT LLC to NETCO Holding Will probably need to change name for Canadian corp as well Thanks Trish NOTE The information contained in this email message is intended only for use of the individual or entity named above If the reader of this message is not the intended recipient or the employee or agent responsible to deliver it to the intended recipient you are hereby notified that any dissemination distribution or copying of this communication is strictly prohibited If you have received this communication in error please immediately notify us by telephone and destroy the original message Thank you

Attached is a draft of our Services Agreement for CGNN Holding Company Inc If this form is acceptable I will draft a similar agreement for ERMT LLC modified to include the noneconomic member The independent director for ERMT LLC will be Bernard J Angelo and the golden shareholder will be GSS Contract Services I Inc a Delaware corporation Please feel free to call me with any questions or comments that you may have Best regards Andy Stidd Global Securitization Services LLC West Main Street Suite Babylon New York Tel ext Fax wwwgssnyccom See attached file GSS Services Indemnity Agrdoc NETCO Holdings Cc Andy is asking for invoice information and address to complete the Services and Indemnity Agreement FYI we need the Independent directors signature from here on out for any corporate actions so we need to try to get this Agreement finalized and signed up today Thanks Trish Forwarded by Trish LindloffDAWGMUS on PM Andrew L Stidd on PM cc Subject NETCO Holdings Dear Trish Attached is a draft of our agreement for NETCO We just need invoicing information and company addresses to complete both agreement Please feel free to call me with any questions or comments that you may have Best regards Andy Stidd Global Securitization Services LLC West Main Street Suite Babylon New York Tel ext Fax wwwgssnyccom See attached file GSS Services Indemnity Agr NETCO Hldgsdoc NOTE The information contained in this email message is intended only for use of the individual or entity named above If the reader of this message is not the intended recipient or the employee or agent responsible to deliver it to the intended recipient you are hereby notified that any dissemination distribution or copying of this communication is strictly prohibited If you have received this communication in error please immediately notify us by telephone and destroy the original message Thank you GSS Services Indemnity Agr NETCO Hldgsdoc

Swapco Outstanding Items Cc legal In order to complete our files please send copies of signatures to the following documents Certificate of Amendment to Certificate of Formation of ERMT LLC regarding name change to NETCO Holdings LLC Certificate of Amendment To Certificate of Incorporation of ESVL Corp regarding name change to ERMT Corp Amended and Restated Certificate of Incorporation of ERMT Corp regarding name change to The New Energy Trading Company Written Consent of the Sole Stockholder of ERMT Corp dated Unanimous Written Consent of the Board of Directors of ERMT Corp dated Unanimous Written Consent of the Board of Directors of Enron North America Corp dated regarding contribution to RMT Unanimous Written Consent of the Board of Directors of Risk Management Trading Corp dated regarding contribution to ERMT LLC Unanimous Written Consent of the Board of Directors of ERMT LLC dated regarding contribution to ERMT Corp Cross Receipt of ERMT and RMT regarding Unanimous Written Consent of the Board of Directors of ERMT Corp dated authorizing certain agreements Unanimous Written Consent of the Board of Control of ERMT LLC dated regarding issuance of Units Acknowledgment of Receipt of ENA Unanimous Written Consent of the Board of Control of ERMT LLC dated regarding issuance of Class B Unit Cross Receipt of ERMT LLC and GSS Contract Services I will hold this until we get the check from GSS Counter signature for the Services and Indemnity Agreement with GSS We will also need copies of the Stock Certificate of ERMT Corp issued to ERMT LLC and the Unit Certificates of ERMT LLC issued to ENA and RMT If you would forward to me the original Class B Unit Certificate issued to GSS I will send that to them and coordinate getting their signature on the Cross Receipt and check Please call me if you have any questions My number is and my fax number here in Dallas is Thanks Trish NOTE The information contained in this email message is intended only for use of the
